thread.title: Annette
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Annette

author: Annette
title: Annette
text: I called at 8pm and i was on the phone with the lady for about three hours my phone for disconnected about 3 times and she made sure she called back. She was very professional and i really appreciate that because i was going through so much at the time that she made my over all experience better.she also was persistant with finding me a Quote: that meet my needs and budget and i was super happy thank your so much select
